CustomField.description: Created as a part of SFS-4803
CustomField.inlineHelpText: There are a number of different types of Access Deterrent Measure ADM. Most pipe bridges will have some form of access deterrent measure, and those that don't probably require it. This section is to determine if what is there is sufficient and what condition it is in.

value.label: ADM's fitted and appear to be in reasonable condition

value.label: No ADM's fitted and deemed not necessary
